alert.note: Alert for Natrona (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 17 at 2:25PM MDT until May 17 at 2:45PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM MDT FOR EAST CENTRAL NATRONA COUNTY... At 224 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Emigrant Gap, or 7 miles west of Casper, moving southeast at 25 mph. At 215 PM, a trained spotter reported quarter size hail. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Southwestern Casper, Mills, Red Butte, Emigrant Gap, Paradise Valley, Beartrap Meadows County Park, Casper Mountain, Central Wyoming Fairgrounds, Rotary Park, Casper Mountain County Park and Casper-Natrona County International Airport. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
